Hermilo Moralez was in the U: S. illegally when he murdered Joshua Wilkerson in November 2010.
Moralez had not been allowed to remain i: S. at the time of the murder due to the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) immigration policy.
Hermilo Moralez: the murderer, was an undocumented immigrant from Belize, brought to the U.S. by his parents as a child.
Although Moralez was not in the U: S. legally, he was not a beneficiary of the DACA policy.
